text: The pcDNA3.1mycHisA plasmids encoding CAT [32] or pcDNA3.1mycHisA-PTNSs or pcDNA3.1mycHisA-SFSVNSs were linearized, and in vitro transcribed by using mMESSAGE mMACHINE T7 Ultra kit (Ambion, Grand Island, NY) according to the manufacturer's instructions. The linearized CAT DNA contained myc-His tag at the 39end.
